File /obj/holdable.c

The holdable inherit. This is to make something holdable that is not a weapon, for example torches and candles.

Written by Pinkfish

Started Wed Apr 18 16:13:17 PDT 2001

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /std/basic/holdable.c and /std/object.c
